column1: ifntjjong 122639050652 "2015-06-28 02:23:02 GMT" http://ifntjjong.tumblr.com/post/122639050652/info-real-men-with-sungjong-airs-tonight-at  True text
ifntjjong 121012041352 "2015-06-08 10:18:34 GMT" http://ifntjjong.tumblr.com/post/121012041352/info-sungjong-added-to-real-men-cast-lineup "On June 8
column2: a representative of Woollim Entertainment confirmed
column3: “It is true that Sungjong has joined the filming of ‘Real Men.’ He has cut his hair fitting for ‘Real Men.’”It is said that Sungjong is set to join the cast members of the show to receive guerilla training at the Nodo Unit located in Gangwon Province during today’s filming.Meanwhile
column4: the producers of the new season of “Real Men” have been displaying a flexible format for the show
column5: as they have not been setting any fixed cast members.Also the filming starts today
column8: he will not join the 5th anniversary live radio broadcast. Woollim said it’s unfortunate he’s unable to join but the 6 members will fill his empty spot. Sungjong is naturally strong-willed and because the members know this
column9: there is a lot of cheers and encouragement for him. Info credit: Soompi | theinfinite7" True text
